name: Heads up! (itch)
description:
After the apocalypse, humans don't have phones, games or Netflix anymore, so we have fun by shooting zombie heads to the moon.

Shoot your zombie as high as you can and try not to make a bloody mess out of it!

Controls:

  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left mouse button - Shoot
  • Escape - Pause

Music "Hogs D'amour" by Turdstorm: https://turdstorm.bandcamp.com

This is the fourth game in a one game a week personal challenge made during December 2018
